title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the data set returns a wrong result or null result set.
OB: When a filter expression 'row[0] equals to' is set in the data set and previewed, the first result record is returned instead of showing an error message or returning an empty result set.
EB: An error message related to the invalid filter expression should pop up when attempting to preview the data set with an incomplete filter expression.
SR:
1. Open the data set configuration.
2. Set a filter expression in the data set configuration with 'row[0] equals to'.
3. Attempt to preview the data set.

Expected: An error message should be displayed or an empty result set should be returned.
Actual: The first result record is returned instead, without any error message.
